data.title: denny walley
data.text:
In 1991, Denny Walley took part in the "Zappa's Universe" concert series.

Early 2003, Denny Walley started playing with The Magic Band. They played some concerts in April, 2003, and continued in November.

June 2003, he lead the Zappa Corner concerts at the Umeå Internationella Kammarmusik Festival that took place from 2003/06/09 to 2003/06/15. The Zappa Corner band did two concerts.

Denny Walley also performed as a special guest with Big Eyed Beans From Venus, a Beefheart tribute band.

In 2009 and 2010, Denny Walley was special guest at the Zappanale festival in Bad Doberan, Germany.

At the 2010 edition of the Zappanale festival, he performed with Don Condor & The Texas Outpost, with The Muffin Men, and with The Central Scrutinizer Band.

April 2011, Denny Walley did a short European tour with The Muffin Men, celebrating the Muffin Men's 20th anniversary.

discography

random notes

denny has covered a couple of zappa tunes on a title called spare parts. (uae,uae disc 5)

denny walley performed on the last night of zappa's universe performing the blues version of "bamboozled by love" (nov. 10,1991). he and his wife "janet the planet" (yes from baby snakes movie) were seen at the night of zappa music at lincoln center in feb. 1993 (i saw them, they were 3 seats over from me). (source: my eyes & ears)

apparently denny runs a recording studio in the atlanta, ga area - chamblee i think. a neighbor of mine is moses mo of mothers finest and is in contact with denny once in a while.

currently (april '95) denny is over in sweden on some captain beefheart reunion tour or something.

i saw him live on stage at the fasching in stockholm, sweden on the 4th of april 1995. he was playing slide guitar in a beefheart cover band (with the swedish singer freddie wadling as beefheart). the two swedish zappa's universe players, morgan agren and mats oberg, were also in the band. i know the band rehearsed for one week and played two shows. it was an unbelievably good band, and very, very popular.

denny is running mgm scenery works shop. not a recording studio. the performance in sweden was a "tribute" that started up on the 1st of april 1995 in umea combined with art-exhibition with a dozen of his paintings. second concert was on april 2nd and third in stockholm april 4th. also in the band were jimmy aagren on guitar and rolf hedqvist on bass. morgan will probably release some of the stuff on a cd later this year.

check the mats & morgan homepage for more info.

peter öberg (peterobe@vbtn.sr.se) sez:

guitarist denny walley played a show at the ume_ jazz festival in sweden on the 26th of october (1996). ex. zappa sideman walley had put together a band that included drummer morgan +gren and keyboardist mats +berg (both ex. zappa's universe) plus three other young musicians.

they performed rhythm&blues classics as mannish boy, i can't be satisfied, diddy wah diddy...the last songs in the regular set were suicide chumpand bamboozled by love, two zappa songs that denny used to sing when he was touring with frank in the fall of '78.

the only encore was china pig performed by denny alone. (the original version of this captain beefheart song appears on the trout mask replica album).

arthur said:

denny and janet the planet were also present at the ensemble moderne show in new york in april 1996. ensemble moderne performed 'the girl in the magnesium dress', 'get whitey', g spot tornado, and 'dog/meat'.

from: per wikstrom (uae@com.itv.se)

ultimate audio entertainment - http://www.morganagren.com/

mats/morgan "live": this album was recorded during the bands latest tour and is jam-packed with knock-yer-socks-off performances. this year mats/morgan celebrate 20 years of being a musical entity, and to celebrate this they enbarke on yet another tour. if you have your way through stockholm on february 27-28 (2001), we are having a release party at fasching, and you're invited!!. guests include denny walley, ali askin, todd yvega, and the ever so amazing artis the spoonman!
